questions.text: Which of the following is a key component of a SCADA system?
What is the function of a Human-Machine Interface (HMI) in a SCADA system?
options: To provide a graphical interface for operators to monitor and control processes
questions.correctAnswer: To provide a graphical interface for operators to monitor and control processes

questions.text: How is IIoT changing traditional SCADA systems?
options: By replacing them entirely with cloud-only solutions
By enabling remote access, cloud integration, and advanced analytics on SCADA data
By reducing the amount of data they can handle
questions.correctAnswer: By enabling remote access, cloud integration, and advanced analytics on SCADA data

questions.text: What is a major security challenge for SCADA systems?
options: They were often designed before cybersecurity was a major concern and can be vulnerable
They automatically update their own security patches
They do not connect to any networks
questions.correctAnswer: They were often designed before cybersecurity was a major concern and can be vulnerable
